name: Many-Go-Round (Epic GameJam 2020)
description:
This is a small game I made for the Epic GameJam 2020 on the theme "It's been a long time but we're not done yet."

My take on the theme was that humanity has been fighting for survival for a long time, before it was avoiding predators and gathering food, and in modern times we still struggle to survive but for different reasons, so we're not done yet.

I've been learning Unreal Engine and Blender for 6 months, so this is the extent of what I can do in 6 days :)
